attributes.review: I downloaded this app for obvious reasons: to support our favorite non-homophobic, non-racist, and non-sexist man in the United States of America. However, things took a turn for the worst once I saw the opening screen of the app. In front of me was the scariest thing I have ever seen in my life: an old, crippled Oompa Loompa with skin as orange as a baboonâ€™s behind. I eventually realized that this was a picture of our lord and savior Donald, though. So, I continued to gaze at the screen when I then saw that Donald was asking me for my phone number?!? Correct me if Iâ€™m wrong, but Donald is happily married to our â€œNÅ’...â€ queen Melania, who is popping off at 25 years younger than Donald himself. I was just baffled to see that my inspiration in life is a cheater, not to mention that I am a minor as well. But, as Donald is just so darn handsome, I agreed to the request and handed over my digits. Then, I started receiving spam texts and calls from Mr. Trump. Not to be rude, but Donald was trying SO hard to get me to recognize him. This was just overwhelming me, so I blocked the phone number and deleted the app. Then Donald hacked into my phone and started to serenade me with his marvelous singing capabilities. His voice made my heart beat faster than my Grandmaâ€™s did when she had a heart attack, his voice was just so soft and soothing. He told me he wanted to meet up, so I gave him my address. Later that day, I heard the handsome man knocking on my front door. There he was, wearing nothing but a towel. Letâ€™s just say, things got a little frisky later that evening. But then he left... he left me there on my bed, filled with his reproductive cells. How could you do this Donald?!? We had a special bond, more special than the one you have with Melania. We were ENDGAME Donald!!! You just left me. I had to clean myself up. And now Iâ€™m pregnant... Iâ€™m giving birth to your son, Donald, and you wonâ€™t even be here to see him grow into a man. Heâ€™ll be twice the man you ever were, Donald. I want child support. Anyways, donâ€™t download this app because Donald will harass you, come to your house, knock you up, and then leave. His peepee was also very tiny and was barely even visible.

Immediately after I clicked submit, I got a call that I didnâ€™t recognize from Washington DC and thought wait a second, this could be my trumpy bear!! So of course I picked up.
